src:
Kranjčane prebudil alarm, prihiteli so gasilci
Zgodilo se je pozno zvečer.
07 Nov 2019, 05:52 by N. B.
KRANJ – Ob 22.21 se je na Slovenskem trgu v objektu sprožil požarni alarm, poroča uprava za zaščito in reševanje.Gasilci GARS Kranj so na kraju ugotovili, da se po hodniku širi dim, vendar vzroka niso našli. Prezračili so prostore in resetirali centralo.
text:
Carniolan was awakened by an alarm, firefighters arrived
It happened late at night.
07 Nov 2019, 05:52 by N. B.
KRANJ - At 22.21, a fire alarm was triggered at the facility in Slovenian Square, the Administration for Protection and Rescue reported. They ventilated the premises and reset the plant.
